get.desc: Get all Application Insights web tests defined within a specified resource group.

200.desc: A list containing 0 or more web test definitions.

delete.desc: Deletes an Application Insights web test.

204.desc: No content: the request was successful, but the response is empty (the request to delete failed because the specified web test does not exist).

200.desc: Successful request to delete a web test definition.
